contentrichtext.text: '''''XL Recordings Chapters''''' was a musical compilation series which between 1990 and 1995 showcased tracks from the [[XL Recordings]] record label. Also other notable [[Breakbeat Hardcore]], [[House music|House]] and [[Techno]] tracks, XL's output at the time, were featured from other labels. XL acts on the chapters series included : * [[Empirion]] * [[Jonny L]] * Liquid * Nu-Matic * [[The Prodigy]] * [[SL2]] Other non-XL acts included : * [[Brooklyn Funk Essentials]] * The House Crew * Kicks Like A Mule * [[Praga Khan]] * Project One * [[Shut Up and Dance (band)|Shut Up and Dance]] * [[Underworld (band)|Underworld]] * [[Josh Wink|Winx]] ==The Chapters== * '''''The First Chapter''''' - 1990 **1.
